markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Snapping Flytrap](/Monsters.aspx?ID=208)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The snapping flytrap is a ravenous, carnivorous plant that is quick to bite at any creature that passes by. Snapping flytraps typically have two sets of tooth-edged leaves, each measuring 3 feet wide, at the end of 10-foot-long stalks.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Snapping Flytrap](/Monsters.aspx?ID=208)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 160</row>

**Perception** +7; tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +5

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 50

**Immunities**
mental

**Resistances**
acid 5

**Weaknesses**
fire 5

**Quick Capture** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature hits or touches the flytrap. **Effect** The flytrap makes a leaf Strike against the triggering creature. If it hits, the creature is grabbed in that leaf.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
leaf +11 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+2 piercing plus 1d6 acid and Improved Grab

**Focused Assault** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The flytrap attacks a single target with both its leaves. The flytrap makes one leaf Strike. On a success, the flytrap deals the damage from one leaf Strike plus an additional 1d8 damage for every leaf beyond the first. On a failure, the flytrap deals the damage from one leaf Strike, but it can’t use Improved Grab. It deals no damage on a critical failure. This counts toward the flytrap’s multiple attack penalty as a number of attacks equal to the number of leaves the flytrap has.

**Hungry Flurry** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The flytrap makes two leaf Strikes at a –2 penalty, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the flytrap’s multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn’t increase until after it makes all its attacks.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Medium, 1d8+1 bludgeoning plus 1d6 acid, Rupture 5

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-48" />
name: Snapping Flytrap
